entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023
